```{r Clear memory and setup}
rm(list=ls())
options(scipen=999)
```

```{r Load Packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(fixest)
```

```{r Load Data}
odi_ind <- read.csv("../Temporary/odi_fdi.csv")
```

```{r Regressions}
mod1 <- feols(log(tcr) ~ log(fdi), odi_matched)
mod2 <- feols(log(tcr) ~ log(fdi)|Year, odi_matched)
mod3 <- feols(log(tcr) ~ log(fdi)|Year + STREET, odi_matched)
mod4 <- feols(tcr ~ log(fdi), odi_matched)
mod5 <- feols(tcr ~ log(fdi)|industry, odi_matched)
etable(mod1, mod2, mod3, mod4, mod5)
```
